Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_TOPINItemXRef' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_TOPINItemXRef] GO CREATE VIEW v_TOPINItemXRef AS with ItemXrefCTE as ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CompanyID, InventoryID Order BY InventoryID) as Seq,* FROM INItemXRef WHERE companyid > 0 ) SELECT * FROM ItemXrefCTE WHERE Seq = 1
